response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to revolutionize its industry. This product offers unparalleled capabilities and efficiency, setting new standards in its field. Given its exceptional quality and innovative features, we believe it is worth significantly more than its market value. We are offering you the opportunity to acquire this game-changing product at an exclusive price of $950,000. This is an extraordinary chance to secure a high-value asset at a favorable rate. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this special offer.", "product_price": 950000}
